trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Fredericksburg
There were no other sightings in Fredericksburg on or around December 17th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi own a brick home with a metal roof. around 11pm december 17th, 2007, i heard something on my roof. it was 2 thuds, then 2 more thuds followed. my roof has a very steep pitch and i was wondering what could have landed on it without sliding off. my 2 dogs are in the backyard and the youngest dog barked once. the older dog which barks all the time never barked at all, which is very strange. then i heard the dogs make a weird noise i have never heard before. it was like a combination of a whine and a howl, then silence. i kept listening, very alert, trying to figure out what was going on. i looked towards the window. the curtain i close every night was open about an inch and a half, which i know i had closed all the way earlier. as i lie there looking at the curtain i started getting very sleepy and that was it. i didn't remember anything until later the next evening when i decided to take a soaking bath instead of a shower like i usually do. i was in the tub and felt a burning sensation on my left knee. i looked down and there was a pyramid shaped red mark that looks like a burn on my knee. it measures 2" at the bottom and the sides measure 1 1\2". the edges are straight and well defined. my daughter took a photo of it. a week later the mark is still there.
